hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT INNER_QUERY.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT LDIROA.CD100_ID as ID, LDIROA.CD100_OFFERID as OFFERID, LDIROA.CD100_OFFERNAME as OFFERNAME, LDIROA.CD100_RECURRENTE as RECURRENTE, LDIROA.CD100_DURACION as DURACION, LDIROA.CD100_DURACIONUNIDAD as DURACIONUNIDAD, LDIROA.CD100_PRECIO as PRECIO, LDIROA.CD100_DESCRIPCION as DESCRIPCION, LDIROA.CD100_ESTADO as ESTADO, LDIROA.CD100_ORDEN as ORDEN, LDIROA.CD100_DESTACADO as DESTACADO, LDIROA.CD100_FECHAINGRESO as FECHAINGRESO, LDIROA.CD100_FECHAMODIFICACION as FECHAMODIFICACION, LDIROA.CD100_TIPOPRODUCTO as TIPOPRODUCTO, LDIROA.CD100_TIPO_BOLSA as TIPOBOLSA FROM SUCVIRDASHBOARD.CD100_BOLSAS_LDI_ROAMING LDIROA WHERE LDIROA.CD100_ESTADO ='1' AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPOPRODUCTO = :P_TY_PROD AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPO_BOLSA = :P_TY_BOLSA ORDER BY LDIROA.CD100_PRECIO ASC ) INNER_QUERY WHERE ROWNUM <= :P_LAST_ROW) WHERE RNUM > :P_FIRST_ROW

SELECT * FROM (SELECT INNER_QUERY.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT LDIROA.CD100_ID as ID, LDIROA.CD100_OFFERID as OFFERID, LDIROA.CD100_OFFERNAME as OFFERNAME, LDIROA.CD100_RECURRENTE as RECURRENTE, LDIROA.CD100_DURACION as DURACION, LDIROA.CD100_DURACIONUNIDAD as DURACIONUNIDAD, LDIROA.CD100_PRECIO as PRECIO, LDIROA.CD100_DESCRIPCION as DESCRIPCION, LDIROA.CD100_ESTADO as ESTADO, LDIROA.CD100_ORDEN as ORDEN, LDIROA.CD100_DESTACADO as DESTACADO, LDIROA.CD100_FECHAINGRESO as FECHAINGRESO, LDIROA.CD100_FECHAMODIFICACION as FECHAMODIFICACION, LDIROA.CD100_TIPOPRODUCTO as TIPOPRODUCTO, LDIROA.CD100_TIPO_BOLSA as TIPOBOLSA FROM SUCVIRDASHBOARD.CD100_BOLSAS_LDI_ROAMING LDIROA WHERE LDIROA.CD100_OFFERID= :P_OFFER AND LDIROA.CD100_ESTADO ='1' AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPOPRODUCTO = :P_TY_PROD AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPO_BOLSA = :P_TY_BOLSA ORDER BY LDIROA.CD100_PRECIO ASC ) INNER_QUERY WHERE ROWNUM <= :P_LAST_ROW) WHERE RNUM > :P_FIRST_ROW

SELECT count(LDIROA.CD100_ID) count FROM SUCVIRDASHBOARD.CD100_BOLSAS_LDI_ROAMING LDIROA WHERE LDIROA.CD100_ESTADO ='1' AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPOPRODUCTO = :P_TY_PROD AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPO_BOLSA = :P_TY_BOLSA

SELECT count(LDIROA.CD100_ID) count FROM SUCVIRDASHBOARD.CD100_BOLSAS_LDI_ROAMING LDIROA WHERE LDIROA.CD100_OFFERID= :P_OFFER AND LDIROA.CD100_ESTADO ='1' AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPOPRODUCTO = :P_TY_PROD AND LDIROA.CD100_TIPO_BOLSA = :P_TY_BOLSA
